summary: Outdoor lighting for the Hearthfire Windstad Manor home.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF9900][size=4]Is your Windstad Manor home too dark outside?
Do you get attacked by unseen enemies?
Do you just want to feel at home, instead of in the woods?  
[/size][/color]
If any of these are true, or you just want a cozy feeling, then try Lights for Windstad Manor.
This outdoor lighting fixtures are constructed as you would normally have created it in the process of building your home.  The light poles are constructed out of sturdy pine, and the lanterns have 2 candles in them.


[size=3]Description:[/size]
Free standing light poles designed to give more lighting surrounding the Windstad Manor player home added by the Hearthfire DLC. 
[size=3][color=#FF0000]Please note that the Hearthfire DLC is required.[/color][/size]

The light fixtures are stand alone which means whatever configuration you create your house, they will to blend in and create a warm atmosphere for outdoor, night time living.


[size=3]Notes:[/size]
I was going to add this in as a building option for the player to build at the bench, but I abandoned the idea because if Bethesda changes the scripts (and they will), it will break my MOD.  
If the player does not want the lights, they can disable the MOD.

If you like this MOD, then please try:

  

[i]Other lit homes are under construction, and comments are always welcome.[/i]

Heljarchen Hall Lights
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25658]Nexus: Heljarchen Hall Lights[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103343876]Steam: Heljarchen Hall Lights[/url]

Lakeview Manor Lights
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25708]Nexus: Lakeview Manor Lights[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103510112]Steam: Lakeview Manor Lights[/url]



Version History:

Version 1.2 October 18, 2012

- The lights do not appear on the property until the player purchases the property from the Jarl.


Version 1.1 October 13, 2012

- Added a new light at the end of the Hatchery
- Lights near the Hatchery only appear if the player builds a Hatchery
- Light near the Carriage only appear if the player hires a Carriage Driver


Version 1.0 October 12, 2012

- Initial version
author: GaryFishFX
